I'm a Business Analyst and Program Manager

About me

Enthusiastic about merging business acumen with technological innovation!

Armed with a well-rounded educational background and a strategic mindset, my focus is on contributing to the convergence of business analytics and project management.

Let's connect and explore how my diverse knowledge, coupled with my passion for innovation, can be a valuable asset to your team's success.

View Resume

Projects

Healthcare Cost Prediction

Effectively created a healthcare cost prediction tool in RStudio, employing Linear Regression and Support Vector Machines, with an impressive 97% accuracy rate. This tool enables stakeholders like providers, insurers, and individuals to improve financial management, optimize resource allocation, and make informed decisions, ultimately alleviating financial stress in the healthcare industry and enhancing patient care. It also offers data-driven insights with scatter plots, maps, histograms, and bar charts, aiding businesses in reducing healthcare costs. Developed proficiency in R programming, including ggplot and ggmap, throughout the project.

View Project

Most Streamed Spotify songs 2023

Conducted comprehensive data analysis on the "Top Spotify Songs 2023" dataset sourced from Kaggle, exploring various song attributes such as popularity, danceability, and energy. Utilized Python libraries including Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn to manage, clean, and visualize the data, ensuring accuracy and clarity throughout the analysis process. Addressed comparison questions regarding daily and monthly streaming patterns, as well as the range of release years for songs in the dataset, providing valuable insights into music consumption trends. Generated visualizations and output files including graphs, charts, and CSV tables to effectively communicate findings and facilitate further exploration of the dataset.

View Project

Innovative Office Infrastructure Project

Led a project tasked with establishing a fully-equipped office space, including furniture and equipment procurement. Responsibilities encompassed resource allocation, ensuring the right individuals were assigned to appropriate tasks, and adhering to strict time and budget constraints. Employed Microsoft Project to meticulously plan, organize, and execute the project, ultimately delivering it within the stipulated timeframe and budget.

View Project

Hospital Database Management System

Collected requirements to define entity needs and then transformed them into both a conceptual data model and a logical data model. Employed various SQL techniques like joins, sub-queries, views, constraints, and scripts to simplify complex queries involving multiple tables. Created a web application using Microsoft Power Apps, offering users an interactive graphical user interface comprising more than 20 screens, including three user stories for navigating the application and accessing crucial data.

View Project

Optimizing Student Enrollment Analysis

Conducted dimensional modeling using a bus matrix to capture comprehensive business requirements for a student enrollment database at Syracuse University. Executed SQL queries and database operations within Snowflake to design and create dimensional and fact tables, ensuring alignment with the dimensional modeling workbook.Selected dbt (data build tool) for its seamless integration with Snowflake SQL, facilitating efficient data pipeline development for ELT transformations. Implemented ELT processes using dbt to migrate data from source tables to star schemas in Snowflake, prioritizing data accuracy and completeness. Subsequently, validated the integrity of star schemas and presented insights through visually engaging Power BI dashboards.

View Project

Integrated Data Analysis for Book Attributes and Author Insights

Directed data management and analysis initiatives, refining data from diverse sources like local files and web-hosted JSON files. Orchestrated the integration of datasets based on a shared column, unifying them based on a common column, enabling comprehensive scrutiny of book attributes, author details, and publication statuses. Utilized various visualization techniques such as bar plots, histograms, scatter plots, line plots, and box plots to communicate insights effectively. Leveraged tools like Scrapy ,BeautifulSoup, Matplotlib, NumPy, and Pandas for proficient data handling and visualization, ensuring clarity and readability for stakeholders.

View Project

Retail Store Application

Designed over 10 screens within a PowerApps application tailored for a retail store, enabling employees to submit leave requests. Subsequently, administrators can assess and either approve or reject these requests. The system also maintains a record of the leave approval status, along with the date of approval and the responsible approver's identity for reference.
